problem.markdown:
>>Q1.Bending moment profile for a S.S. beam under U.D.L is parabolic.<< ()True ()False
>>Q2. Tension occurs at bottom of the cantilever beam when point load is applied at the center.<< ()True ()False
Q3. What is a fixed beam?
Q4. What is point of inflection?
Q5. What is Young’s modulus?
Q6. What is the maximum deflection of a S.S. beam when point load is applied at the center?
Q7.The ratio of change in length to the original length is ___________.
